website_summaries.verdict: The Honor 10 is a stylish midrange Android phone, but the OnePlus 6 offers better performance all round for only a little more money.
pros: The Honor 10 delivers the same fast speeds and stylish colours as its cousin, the Huawei P20 Pro, at half the price
It has a standard headphone jack too
cons: The camera doesn’t begin to approach the excellence of the P20 models or the similarly priced OnePlus 6

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect! - 9.5/10
customer_reviews.text: Pros - literally everything about this phone is amazing. Battery life build quality fast charge the cameras the display the speaker quality a headphone jack small notch face recognition is snappy fingerprint scanner as well 128gb of storage along with Google photos cloud storage great reception and I live in a low population area in the USA and the OS isn't stock but it's smooth and easy to learn! Cons - not water resistant no expandable storage and not an oled display
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honor 10
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend who lives in the philippines. She loved the phantom color and how the ai camera works. No issues on camera for her. Only issue is that the keyboard sometimes dont respond fast enough. And sometimes she said it freezes for half a second i dunno the specifics.. but she said she loved it. She use to have p9 lite from huawei that was like a huge upgrade from performance specially network where we usually use video call.
customer_reviews.author: DJjin

customer_reviews.title: Certificate FCC
customer_reviews.text: The last summer I bought this phone here and it's going to used in Ecuador but the center of telecomunication say me that I need to homologate with IMEI and the certificate FCC. Can you help me with the certifate, the number from id of certicate and the the URL to comprobate of this certicate, please. Meanwhile the phone is lock by this center of telecomunication.
customer_reviews.author: leonidas

customer_reviews.title: Worse fingerprint
customer_reviews.text: I only choosed it cause I was happy with my Honor 8. Thought it would be better. But wrong. Fingerprint recognizing is annoying. Required multiple attempt. Didn't support T-Mobile 4g. Frustrating. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Saq

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, not so good info
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great, I love it, it works really good, my only problem is that it is a Chinese version, COL-AL10, but in the box it says it is COL-L29. I'm really upset about that, because I can't do some things I would like to do, like changing huawei's launcher. Anyway, a great phone, a wrong info.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gaitan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! Although I can't really tell if its the right color. I ordered phantom green but it looks like irredesent blue. It comes with a phone case and headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow data speeds on T-Mobile LTE network. Shipped w/ British plug.
customer_reviews.text: The main problem was that this phone doesn't really work with T-Mobile's LTE network. Data speeds were 0.5 - 5.0 mps, which is much slower than the 6.0 -15.0 speeds it should be running. Also, it shipped with a British charger, which is annoying as I'd have been ok with a US or EU charger.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty rad
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is a bit lacking, but I've had it as a daily driver for a while now. I would have to say, it works amazingly for what i need it to do. The audio is solid and crisp. 8/8 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this phone. Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Son loved this brand of phone. Great value considering he breaks phones. Plenty of bells and whistles. Nice variety of accessories available that work in conjunction with the phone. Merry Christmas and our son was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Willison

customer_reviews.title: No LTE for GSM carriers
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality, affordable phone but it didn't work with my T-Mobile sim and I couldn't get LTE for my data.
customer_reviews.author: Leaf

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, perfect size phone for my hand
customer_reviews.text: I love the AI camera! The size of the device is small enough not to stretch out my hand and big enough that it doesn't cramp it, which tends to be the major flaw with phones I check out.
customer_reviews.author: Zyla Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, fast CPU, very good fingerprint reader and camera.
customer_reviews.text: This model is the global version. It has frequencies that work in the AT&T 4G LTE network and with the carriers that are covered in AT&T network. I use H2O wireless. I don't want to make duplicate review about the good camera, night view, battery life and CPU. Just impressive in everything.
customer_reviews.author: OckhamZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price
customer_reviews.text: For the price perfect, Camara amazing better than the iPhone, the best opcion if you no wanna pay 1000 for phone the online problem is the speaker but you can get speaker for 90$ extra you get one the best phone on the market
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Thin, all the features you could want and very fast
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Image render
customer_reviews.text: I am having issue with photos sharping,it mess up the photos clearity.. On less lite it always ask you to hold your phone to sharping the image but it is is totally mess...
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Not for Us customer
customer_reviews.text: Internet speed is very slow , In fact no speed in us.
customer_reviews.author: vaibhav khare

customer_reviews.title: NO 4G SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: Tried all the phone companies, this phone does not have 4G support.
customer_reviews.author: chen

customer_reviews.title: This phone works for AT&T, but not T-mobile.
customer_reviews.text: This phone works for AT&T. When I change to T-mobile, the network is slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My screen stopped displaying, back light still works just can't see anything on the screen
customer_reviews.text: Overall really liked the phone however my screen went out
customer_reviews.author: David Lanham

customer_reviews.title: The AC adapter that comes doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The supercharger that comes is made for China, NOT for USA. An adapter was sent, but it doesn't fit. I can't understand why a phone that is so well rated, doesn't come with the appropiate charger. Now I have to buy an adapter. Another problem is finding the right screen protector. Most of the protectors sold on Amazon don't fit. I really regret having bought this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jezz

customer_reviews.title: No Internet for U.S. users :(
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone alot but unfortunately I will have to return it due to not having any internet service and the screen starting to ghost touch and restart over and over after only two weeks :(
customer_reviews.author: Melondy

customer_reviews.title: The best phone
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for a little over a year. It still works amazing, just like on day one. The specs are still top notch even a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Miss B Math Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the honor family
customer_reviews.text: Great phone that lasts forever and charges so quickly. I would get into bed with a dead phone, plug it in, take a shower/feed the cat and come back to a phone 50/60% charged. Only complaint is the screen gets scratched by metal pretty easily, so don't keep your phone in the same pocket as your keys.
customer_reviews.author: fftk

customer_reviews.title: Best sub $400 phone
customer_reviews.text: Truly an awesome phone. My only complain is the difficulty finding accessories, such as screen protectors. That's not the phones fault though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Android pie is supported
customer_reviews.text: Grate phone me and my wife are are fan of honor better phone for the price than most
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Everything is as they said.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only had the phone for less than a month, and everything is good so far. great camera,
customer_reviews.author: <ZAM>

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money. Bought it for my son. He loves it. Does some minor gaming, and the phone is not laggy.
customer_reviews.author: Kempers Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone and before buying it i did plenty of research and I'm content woth my new phome
customer_reviews.author: Avrage

customer_reviews.title: Finger print reader issue
customer_reviews.text: It is the feature they were advertising about, yet the sensor is not very sensitive or accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Ahdewr

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to buy. Nice and strong phone. And excellent seller
customer_reviews.author: Al-Mutairi

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Got warranty don’t know how to do the set up or how to get my money back plz help
customer_reviews.author: Carol Adra

product_meta.title: Huawei Honor 10 (COL-L29) 128GB Black, Dual Sim, Dual Camera 24MP+16MP, 4GB RAM, GSM Unlocked International Model, No Warranty
product_meta.description: Color:BlackUnlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all regions: 2G : GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2, 3G bands: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1700 / 1900 / 2100, 4G bands: LTE 2100 (B1), 1900 (B2), 1800 (B3), 850 (B5), 800 (B6), 2600 (B7), 900 (B8), 1700/1800 (B9), 700 (B12), 700 (B17), 800 (B20), 850 (B26), 700 (B28), 1500 (B32), TD-LTE 2000 (B34), 2600 (B38), 1900 (B39), 2300 (B40), 2500 (B41). 5. 84 inches 1080 x 2280 pixels, 19: 9 ratio (~432 pip density) - Corning Gorilla Glass - Android 8. 1 (Oreo) - Octal-core, 128GB of Storage Capacity + 4GB RAM - Non-removable Li-Po 3400 mash battery - Ultra-fast Face Unlock, Rear Dual Camera: 24MP+16MP New Dual AI Camera - Video: 2160p@30fps, 1080p@30fps - Secondary Camera: 24 MP, f/2. 0 - Fingerprint (front-mounted). This device may not include a US as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items. The box contains: Your new device, USB cable, Charger (may be foreign), Documentation. Different Angles, Different Colors The new Aurora glass design reflects vivid colors from every direction. *Only Phantom Blue and Phantom Green come with a reflective glass design. 24MP+16MP AI Camera - From Amateur to Professional24MP+16MP New Dual AI Camera，F1. 8 wide Aperture. The AI Camera Recognizes Multiple Subjects and Applies Localized Optimization in One Image Cutting-edge AI algorithm instantaneously pairs subjects with their optimal camera settings according to the context of the image. Faster and more efficient AI algorithm performance backed by an independently built-in Neural Processing Unit (NPU). 24MP Front AI Camera for the Perfect Selfie The Honor 10 takes selfies seriously. The result is a selfie that is sharp, focused and beautifully lit - professional yet natural. 3D Portrait Lighting The Honor 10 comes with upgraded face recognition and facial modeling. Plus, the AI-powered system creates the professional studio lighting effects. Ultrasonic Under-glass Fingerprint Sensor The ultrasonic fingerprint sensor under the glass enables fast phone unlock, even with wet hands. Stronger and Smarter Core - AI Powered by Independent NPU Faster, stronger, and seamless smartphone experience. NPU built-in to constantly learn about your usage behavior.
feature_bullets: 5. 84 inches 1080 x 2280 pixels, 19: 9 ratio (~432 pip density) - Corning Gorilla Glass - Android 8. 1 (Oreo) - Octal-core, 128GB of Storage Capacity + 4GB RAM - Non-removable Li-Po 3400 mash battery - Ultra-fast Face Unlock, Rear Dual Camera: 24MP+16MP New Dual AI Camera - Video: 2160p@30fps, 1080p@30fps - Secondary Camera: 24 MP, f/2. 0 - Fingerprint (front-mounted).
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
